item.description:
Hi,

Our next book is "Boston Noir", a collection of short stories edited by Dennis Lehane (Mystic River; Gone, Baby, Gone).

The voting this month was overwhelmingly in favor of this book, so it sounds like people are excited to read this.

'http://www.amazon.com/Boston-Noir-Akashic-Dennis-Lehane/dp/1933354917/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1266779126&sr=8-1'

Note the change of location: Hei La Moon in Chinatown/Leather District.

Happy reading!

Jon
item.name: Boston readers: March meeting. "Boston Noir", edited Dennis Lehane
